project.name: Tryambakam Noesis Ecosystem Website
assumptions: Noesis ecosystem architecture docs are canonical for layer modeling and access flows.
Selemene remains an external computation surface; this repo does not implement engine frontends.
Kopina integration uses technical nomenclature and campaign links as defined in KOPINA-INTEGRATION.md.
Primary delivery target is Cloudflare Pages + Workers with Supabase Postgres and Realtime.
Initial launch supports anonymous exploration plus authenticated admin/editor publishing.
risks: Cross-document inconsistencies (13 vs 16 engines, legacy phrasing) can leak into public content.
WebGL performance variability across mobile devices may require progressive reduction in node complexity.
RLS or auth misconfiguration could block editorial workflows or expose unpublished content.
Weak handoff UX from ecosystem nodes to external compute surfaces may lower conversion.
Telemetry volume from high-frequency canvas interactions can impact API cost and latency.
